overview: Fresh, energetic and anointed describes the worship style of Mary Alessi. As an accomplished singer/songwriter, keyboardist and speaker, “More” is her second worship project that flows from the spirit of Metro Life Worship Center, the ministry she and her husband Steve, founded and pastor in Miami Florida. A wife and mother of four children, Mary’s newest project takes you through the door of worship, right into the heart and presence of God.
title: Mary Alessi: More
